title: Lobby sounds not stopping after joining champ select/game
body: I have been having issues with the ambient noises from the lobby for quite some time and the only fix is to close my client manually after the loading screen appears, then logging back in. Is there anyway we could get an option to turn off the ambient noises without disabling SFX entirely? I don't really like having to listen to the ambient sound to begin with and definitely not during a game.

replies.body: Hmmm that is pretty od tbh. Try running the repair through the client options really quick to make sure the game files are still working properly first, and if that doesn't help try poking our techs over in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to see if they have any other tricks up their sleeve for this kinda thing!
